project_abstract.cdata: The First Port Project, which will finance the first phase of a master plan for the development of Port Louis, includes the following components: (a) construction of port facilities and port administration buildings; (b) purchase of cargo handling equipment and tugs; (c) completion of the port dredging program; (d) consultants' services for engineering and supervision of construction; and (e) technical assistance to the NPA.
